review_blob:
Bottle 500ml @ Sommerhuset
Pours dark reddish brown with a beige head. Aroma has notes of malt, caramel, dried fruits, hint of milk chocolate. Taste is medium to heavy sweet and light bitter with a long sweet caramel, milk chocolate and dried fruity finish. Body is light to medium, texture is oily, carbonation is soft. This is more of a sweet brown ale than stout

Bottle 500ml @ Sommerhuset
Pours clear golden with a white head. Aroma has notes of malt, grain, corn, floral, grass and hint of metal. Taste is medium sweet and light bitter with a long malty, floral, grassy and hint of bread finish. Body is medium, texture is oily, carbonation is soft.

Bottle 500ml @ Sommerhuset
Pours amber brown with a off-white head. Aroma has notes of malt, caramel, brown sugar, nuts and hint of grass. Taste is medium to heavy sweet and light bitter with a long caramel, nutty and slightly grassy finish. Body is medium, texture is oily, carbonation is soft.

Bottle 330ml @ Sommerhuset
Pours deep hazy golden with a small off-white head. Aroma has notes of malt, tartness, caramel, gooseberries, grain, some fruitiness and a weak hint of raisins. Taste is light to medium sweet and medium sour with a long slightly dry, tart, fruity and gooseberry finish. Body is medium, texture is oily, carbonation is soft to flat

Can 355ml @ Sommerhuset
Pours hazy golden with a off-white head. Aroma has notes of malt, citrus, grape, peach, pine needles and hint of pineapple. Taste is light to medium sweet and heavy bitter with a long dry, piney, citrus, peachy and pineapple finish. Body is medium, texture is thin to oily, carbonation is soft.

Bottle 355ml @ Sommerhuset
Pours dark reddish brown with a few off-white bubbles. Aroma has notes of roasted malt, chocolate, cocoa, coffee, oak, alcohol and brown sutgar. Taste is medium to heavy sweet and light to medium bitter with a long warm, caramel, chocolate, cocoa, coffee and oak finish. Body is full, texture is oily, carbonation is flat.

Bottle 750ml @ Sommerhuset
Pours hazy pale yellow with a huge white head. Aroma has notes of malt, wheat, brett, funk, citrus, grapefruit, mango, pineapple, yeast and some fruitiness. Taste is light to medium sweet and medium bitter with a long dry, bitter, funky, brett, mango, pineapple, citrus, grapefruit, pepper and yeasty finish. Body is medium, texture is thin to oily, carbonation is soft.
